amendment.description: To provide for additional security relating to foreign vessels working on the outer Continental Shelf.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4953 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S9567-9574; text: CR S9569) To provide for additional security relating to foreign vessels working on the outer Continental Shelf.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4953 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4953 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Vitter.
